mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gallery(galleryno, adminno, exhino, title, content, passwd, word, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, rdate, price, dc, saleprice, point, min, max) VALUES(gallery_seq.nextval, #{adminno}, #{exhino}, #{title}, #{content}, #{passwd}, #{word}, #{file1}, #{file1saved}, #{thumb1}, #{size1}, sysdate, #{price}, #{dc}, #{saleprice}, #{point}, #{min}, #{max})
mapper.select: SELECT galleryno, adminno, exhino, title, content, jjim, cnt, replycnt, passwd, word, rdate file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, saleprice, min, max FROM gallery ORDER BY galleryno DESC

SELECT galleryno, adminno, exhino, title, content, jjim, cnt, replycnt, passwd, word, rdate, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, price, dc, saleprice, point, salecnt, map, youtube, min, max FROM gallery WHERE exhino=#{exhino} ORDER BY galleryno DESC

SELECT galleryno, adminno, exhino, title, content, jjim, cnt, replycnt, passwd, word, rdate, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, map, youtube, price, dc, saleprice, point, min, max FROM gallery WHERE galleryno = #{galleryno}

SELECT galleryno, adminno, exhino, title, content, jjim, cnt, replycnt, word, rdate, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, map, youtube, min, max FROM gallery
WHERE exhino=#{exhino}
WHERE exhino=#{exhino} AND (UPPER(title) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%' OR UPPER(content) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%' OR UPPER(word) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{word}) || '%')
ORDER BY galleryno DESC

SELECT galleryno, adminno, exhino, title, content, jjim, cnt, replycnt, rdate, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, map, youtube, r FROM ( SELECT galleryno, adminno, exhino, title, content, jjim, cnt, replycnt, rdate, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, map, youtube, rownum as r FROM ( SELECT galleryno, adminno, exhino, title, content, jjim, cnt, replycnt, rdate, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, map, youtube FROM gallery WHERE exhino=#{exhino} ORDER BY jjim DESC ) ) WHERE r >= 1 AND r <= 7

SELECT galleryno, adminno, exhino, title, content, jjim, cnt, replycnt, rdate, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, map, youtube, r FROM ( SELECT galleryno, adminno, exhino, title, content, jjim, cnt, replycnt, rdate, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, map, youtube, rownum as r FROM ( SELECT galleryno, adminno, exhino, title, content, jjim, cnt, replycnt, rdate, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, map, youtube FROM gallery WHERE exhino=#{exhino} ORDER BY rdate DESC ) ) WHERE r >= 1 AND r <= 7

SELECT galleryno, adminno, exhino, title, content, jjim, cnt, replycnt, rdate, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, map, youtube, r FROM ( SELECT galleryno, adminno, exhino, title, content, jjim, cnt, replycnt, rdate, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, map, youtube, rownum as r FROM ( SELECT galleryno, adminno, exhino, title, content, jjim, cnt, replycnt, rdate, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, map, youtube FROM gallery WHERE exhino=#{exhino} ORDER BY cnt DESC ) ) WHERE r >= 1 AND r <= 7
